scripts.lint: npm run protocol:validate && cargo fmt --check && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets -- -D warnings && (cd services/runner && go vet ./...) && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run lint)
scripts.typecheck: cargo check --workspace && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run build)
scripts.test: cargo test -p engine-core && (cd services/runner && go test ./...) && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run test)
scripts.build: cargo build --workspace && (cd services/runner && go build ./...) && (cd extensions/vscode && npm run build)
scripts.verify:fast: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.verify:full: npm run verify:fast && npm run test && npm run build
